attributes.action: Get Philip Schofield on the new £50 note
attributes.background: A social superstar, a nation treasure, the face of Britain. Why wouldn’t you want Philip Schofield as the face of the new £50 note? Go out and make a difference - show the world what Britain’s really about.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
